Using the Script¶

RedAlert will monitor all the things on Reddit that you want to know about. Once you go through the First Time Setup and decide what you want to monitor, you’ll never have to worry about it again. Just start it up, authenticate, and be on your merry way!

This script is designed to be run in terminal on a Linux environment with Python3. Intimidated by the terminal? Don’t be! I’ll walk you through everything.

  • Quick Start

  • First Time Setup
    • Adding your Phone Number
    • Adding your Email
  • Authenticating Reddit
    • Adding More Reddit Accounts

  • Types of Jobs

  • Editing your Jobs
    • Adding Jobs
    • Deleting Jobs
    • Custom Jobs

  • Running the Program!

Quick Start¶

First Download the script. Check that you have the Required Software/Libraries

Then run RedAlert in terminal (be sure your terminal is open in the directory of download):

python3 RedAlert.py
>>RedAlert booting...

Follow First Time Setup and go through the steps of Authenticating Reddit.

RedAlert by default starts by checking your messages. So if that’s all you need, you can just run it from there!
